column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The restaurant overall isn't that big. The layout is long and narrow
column2: with a small bar in front and a dining bar in back facing the kitchen. What I'm trying to say is this place gets packed...at lunch and dinner. There isn't much room inside to wait either
column3: so you may be waiting outside for your name to be called. Once you are seated
column4: you'll see it's well worth the wait.
